sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_news_category ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), domain int4 not null, name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, viewtemplate int2 not null, mark int2 not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar(256), oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (parentid, text), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_news ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32) not null, domain int4 not null, cname varchar(32), status int2 not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, topic varchar(128) not null, keywords varchar(128), author varchar(32), source varchar(32), recommendation int4 not null, recommendationdate timestamp, recommendationduration int4 not null, imagemark bool not null, contentmark int4 not null, comments int4 not null, lastcommentdate timestamp, allowcomments bool not null, indexed bool not null, views int4 not null, description varchar(256), content text, oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique (oorder) );
create table sf_news_comment ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, content text not null, primary key(id) );
